location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Major George Willock, Secretary in Charge of the British Mission, Tabrize [Tabrīz]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: There is a small amount of insect damage at the bottom edge of the folio.

mods.abstract: It is not clear whether this letter is addressed to George Willock, or to his brother, Henry. Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, forwards two letters from the Secretary to the Government (not included). Stannus informs Willock that he is awaiting the arrival at Bushire of a messenger sent by His Royal Highness the Prince of Shiraz [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mīrzā], after which he will embark on a tour of the Arabian coast. Stannus concludes by stating that he has forwarded a box of stationery to the British Mission.
